name: Neighborhood Job Center (NJC)
description: In partnership with the Office of Economic and Workforce Development (OEWD), YCD serves as the Neighborhood Job Center (NJC) for Bayview, offering employment services for ages 16 to 18. Hours NJC is open Monday - Friday from 9am - 5pm.
